channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pickle Storm
channel.desc: There?s a brand new slide at school, and Pickle really wants to try it out. However, things get complicated when Pickle's mood magic causes Mia and Mr Ludcomb?s hair to grow uncontrollably.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: A reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio as they attempt to win the regional dance championships. When Kate asks Emily to hold dance evaluations for placements in the group dance, Emily decides to put Michelle in the back row, which causes waves amongst the dancers.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings find an ultra-modern glowing cabin they can use for their party.
